This _+2 [holy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=299) greater striking [glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20)_ has a long, multi-tailed rainbow-colored banner affixed to the butt of the pole in the style of [Shelyn’s](/Deities.aspx?ID=17) religious symbol. While wielding the glaive, you gain a +2 item bonus on [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks.
